# PR Review Notes

## Overall Assessment
- PASS / CONDITIONAL / BLOCK

## Correctness
- Observations
- Concerns

## Readability & Maintainability
- Clarity of code
- Naming and structure

## Risk Assessment
- Potential failure modes
- Edge cases

## Alignment with PRD
- Matches requirements: Yes / No
- Gaps or deviations

## Questions & Follow-ups
- Open questions
- Required changes
